Package de.lases.business.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
de.lases.business.service.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Dependent public class UserService extends Object implements Serializable
Provides all functionality for creating, manipulating or receiving information about users in the application. In case of an unexpected state, a UIMessage event will be fired.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public User getUser​(User user) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Gets a User-DTO.
      Parameters:
      user - A User-DTO that should contain an existing id value.
      Returns:
      A User-DTO filled with all available fields.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • editUser

      public void editUser​(User newUser) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Manipulates a user.
      Parameters:
      newUser - A User-DTO filled with the fields that are desired to be changed.

      All fields filled with legal values will be overwritten, the rest are ignored. It should contain an existing id value.

      When the email address is changed the verification process is initiated using the EmailUtil utility.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser​(User user)
      Deletes a User from the applications data.
      Parameters:
      user - A User-DTO containing a valid id.

    • emailExists

      public boolean emailExists​(User user)
      Determines whether an email is already in use in this applications.
      Parameters:
      user - A User-DTO containing a valid id and an email-adress.
      Returns:
      true, if the email does already exist. false otherwise.

    • setAvatar

      public void setAvatar​(File avatar)
      Sets a users avatar.

      The avatar is parsed into a thumbnail.

      Parameters:
      avatar - The File containing the image as a byte-array.

    • getAvatar

      public File getAvatar()
      Gets the users' avatar.
      Returns:
      The users' avatar as a byte-array, wrapped by a File.

    • deleteAvatar

      public void deleteAvatar​(User user)
      Deletes a users' avatar.
      Parameters:
      user - A User-DTO containing a valid id.

    • getUsers

      public List<User> getUsers​(Privilege privilege, ResultListParameters resultListParams)
      Gets a sorted and filtered list of users.
      Parameters:
      privilege - The view privileges of the calling user.
      resultListParams - Parameters, that control filtering and sorting of the resulting list.
      Returns:
      A list of User-DTOs.

    • verify

      public boolean verify​(Verification verification)
      Verifies a user's email-address using the EmailUtil utility.
      Parameters:
      verification - A Verification-DTO. Must conatain a valid id and a validationRandom.
      Returns:
      true if the verification process was succesful. false otherwise.

    • isVerified

      public boolean isVerified​(User user)
      Determines whether a users email-address is already verified.
      Parameters:
      user - A User-DTO which should contain a valid id.
      Returns:
      true if the user is verified. false otherwise.
